nodes.bodyText: Should we wait until this is non snapshot and available upstream? Could probably come at that time when 1.16.2 releases?

+             <groupId>net.md-5</groupId>

++            <version>1.16-R0.2-SNAPSHOT</version>

nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't this accept a BaseComponent[] as do other component APIs?

Not everything takes an array. Some things require a singular component. You can wrap your array of components in a singular one like so:
new TextComponent(components)

No that would not work.
That's what is called currently. By just getting the tag you would drop the type and the count.
Yeah, you're right.

I just noticed getTag() returns null when the item doesn't have any additional data (e.g. enchantments, lores)
so, you have to check if the tag is null or not before toString()
Thanks. Fixed by using getOrCreateTag() instead.

Should this not be BaseComponent[]?

We have only one TextComponent that is one BaseComponent.
https://github.com/SpigotMC/BungeeCord/blob/master/chat/src/main/java/net/md_5/bungee/api/chat/hover/content/Entity.java#L36

Perhaps it'd be nice to add a new method to accept BaseComponent[] that simply adds them as extras? This is because ComponentBuilder#create returns BaseComponent[] (as do many other methods to construct them).
Yea, will do that after uni paper stuff.
funny, I asked the same thing
Yeah, but Proxy provided an example where it is reasonable.
Should this not be BaseComponent[]?

We have only one TextComponent that is one BaseComponent.
https://github.com/SpigotMC/BungeeCord/blob/master/chat/src/main/java/net/md_5/bungee/api/chat/hover/content/Entity.java#L36
These methods belong on ItemFactory, no reason to pollute the root API with these.
done

Maybe also another overload method would be nice:
hoverContentOf(Entity) which refers to the entity's already set custom name or just pass null if hasCustomName==false
https://papermc.io/javadocs/paper/1.16/org/bukkit/Nameable.html#getCustomName--
added
